title: Entertainment Live: Omar Sharif remembered - BBC News
summary: doctorr zhivago star omar sharif dies aged 83 .
english national opera artistic director steps down .
first chapter of harper lee 's go set a watchman published .

documents.title: over and out
text: so that 's it for today 's live page !
watch out for bbc arts editor will gompertz 's harper lee exclusive later , and news from ed sheeran 's wembley gigs .
and we 'll be back on monday with a round-up of the best stuff from the weekend at comic-con .
see you then .
author: Victoria Lindrea
Arts and entertainment reporter

documents.title: klingons in wales
text: it seems klingons are alive and well and in wales .
klingon was the chosen language for the welsh government in its response to queries about ufo sightings at cardiff airport .
while english and welsh are the usual forms of communications in the senedd , it opted for the native tongue of the enemies of star trek 's captain kirk .
shadow health minister darren millar had asked for details of ufos sightings and asked if research would be funded .
a welsh government spokesman responded with : `` jang vida je due luq . ''
the welsh government statement continued : `` 'ach ghotvam'e ' qi'yah devolve qas . ''
in full it said it translated as : `` the minister will reply in due course .
however this is a non-devolved matter . ''
it is believed to be the first time the welsh government has chosen to communicate in klingon .
`` i 've always suspected that labour ministers came from another planet , '' said mr millar .
`` this response confirms it . ''

documents.title: rita ora becomes kosovan ambassador
text: rita ora has been named an honorary ambassador to kosovo , the country where she was born .
the singer and x-factor judge received the title from president atifete jahjaga , who called her `` kosovo 's most successful artist '' .
ora , who came to the uk aged one , said she received it with `` great pride and responsibility '' .

`` my parents brought us ( my elder sister and younger brother ) to this country with the hope and the dream that we could get a decent education which is so important for our hopes and values , and for what we want to achieve in our lives , '' she said .
`` i grew up in britain , a country that has given me so much for which i am grateful , but i will always have a special place in my heart for my hometown and kosovo . ''

documents.title: one-hit wonder ?
text: `` it must be the longest we have ever waited for a second novel by a living author - everyone is talking about it . ''
so was to kill a mockingbird a one-hit wonder , or will go set a watchman - under wraps for 55 years - be worth the wait ?
find out all about it in our

documents.title: michelangelo up close
text: michelangelo 's ceiling in the sistine chapel has been recreated in photographs at a convention centre in montreal .

the 33 photographs , taken 20 years ago by the vatican 's official photographer during a restoration of the artwork , have been placed in panels on the walls and the ceiling of the city 's palais des congres .
`` taking photos so close ( to the paintings ) had never been allowed , '' veronica redgrave , the spokeswoman for the exhibit , told afp .
`` even the popes never saw them from this close . ''
the exhibit will be in montreal for three months before heading to toronto and vancouver .

text: take a look at omar sharif 's scene-stealing entrance in david lean 's lawrence of arabia , as sherif ali opposite peter o'toole .

documents.title: more details on sharif
text: further details have emerged regarding the death of actor omar sharif .
the 83-year-old star of lawrence of arabia , who was suffering from alzheimer 's disease , is understood to have had a heart attack while being treated in hospital in cairo , his agent said .

documents.title: breakingbreaking news
text: actor omar sharif , best known for roles in classic films including lawrence of arabia and doctor zhivago , has died at the age of 83 .
egypt-born sharif won two golden globe awards and an oscar nomination for his role as sherif ali in david lean 's 1962 epic lawrence of arabia .
he won a further golden globe three years later for doctor zhivago .
earlier this year , his agent confirmed that he had been diagnosed with alzheimer 's disease .

documents.title: andrew scott 's 'hot nuts '
text: ok , so we may be in danger of overdoing the steve moffat shows at comic-con thing , but this deadpan apology from stars andrew scott , benedict cumberbatch and mark gatiss about why they could n't attend the san diego jamboree is worth a look .

documents.title: finding my feet at comic-con
text: long before arriving at the convention centre hosting comic-con , you know you 're heading in the right direction .
where else would you see a star wars stormtrooper traipsing down one sidewalk or a group of avengers look-a-likes on another ?
the queues are serious , snaking back on each other .
and that 's queues , plural .
a queue for arriving fans .
a queue for press and exhibitors .
a queue for hall h , the venue for many of the most high profile events .
by the time they get in , some fans will have been patiently waiting for days .
there was a huge variety of events on day one .
you could banter about buffy , set phasers for fun with william shatner .
or spend enough money on merchandise to bankrupt the iron bank of braavos .
i managed to chat to some cosplayers ( costume play ) , of which there are plenty , about the love they have for conventions like this .
as well as the occasional problems they have if someone oversteps the mark , or invades their personal space .
best moment : being told by a passer-by they loved my british accent .
worst moment : being told off by a security guard for going the wrong way up an escalator .
author: Lizo Mzimba
Entertainment correspondent at Comic-Con

documents.title: chris evans ' final one show
text: it 's chris evans ' last day presenting the one show , as he bows out to concentrate on his next big project - heading up the new top gear .
guests on his final show include jake gyllenhaal , joanna lumley and richard osman .
evans will still continue to do his bbc radio 2 breakfast show .

documents.title: lego stars in lip sync duel
text: it 's batman v unikitty as the voice stars from the lego movie went head-to-head on lip sync battle .
arrested development actor will arnett kicked off the night with who let the dogs out ? , before returning to the film that united both stars , and
community actress alison brie responded with salt-n-pepa 's shoop and bang bang , complete with '30s-style machine gun , pinstripes and trilby .
and the winner ?
in the end , there can be only one - and that was brie , who thanked arnett for `` sucking so much '' .
author: The Wrap

documents.title: india 's big bucks movies
text: india 's battle epic film bahubali ( strong man ) , billed as its most expensive film to date , is released on friday .
the two-part film , directed by ss rajamouli , was made at a reported cost of about $ 39m ( £ 25m ) .
the film , which has been compared to zack snyder 's fantasy war film 300 , has generated great interest because of its `` massive budget '' and special effects .

documents.title: jennifer lawrence really believes
text: jennifer lawrence was on top form at comic-con panel promoting the final hunger games film .
panel host conan o'brien asked her co-stars , josh hutcherson and liam hemsworth , if she was prone to burst into song .
and so she did

documents.title: watchman `` really promising ''
text: the guardian 's claire armitstead has told bbc radio 4 's today programme that she believes the opening chapter of harper lee 's go set a watchman - which was published for the first time on friday - is `` really promising '' .
she told mishal husain that the first moments of the novel `` set up lots of fascinating scenarios '' , adding `` it 's absolutely recognisably scout 's voice '' .
but she warned that the book , which was written before to kill a mockingbird in the 1950s , has to be read `` as a period piece '' and as `` a companion piece '' .
author: BBC Radio 4

documents.title: eno board 'lost faith ' in berry
text: personal animosities in the arts generally play out behind the scenes .
yet when eno chairman martyn rose quit in january , he openly passed damning judgement on john berry , who remained in his post .
now both men have left .
starting out as a musician , berry joined the eno as casting director in 1995 and has been in overall artistic control since 2005 .

the job of the eno artistic director is to maintain artistic standards and attract the right directors , composers and performers at a time when cash is short and the number of productions has been reduced .
musical standards are chiefly the responsibility of music director mark wigglesworth ,
an early critical hit for the berry regime was the philip glass opera satyagraha in 2007 .
there were plaudits too for britten 's peter grimes in 2009 and terry gilliam 's productions of benvenuto cellini and the damnation of faust ( were audience-grabbers .
on the debit side neither critics nor audiences much enjoyed gaddafi , produced with the asian dub foundation .
mike leigh 's recent production of the pirates of penzance was criticised for a lack of new ideas .
but all artistic directors end their tenure with a balance of hits and misses : john berry 's problem was that too many people on the eno board and at the arts council had lost faith in him .
author: Vincent Dowd
BBC World Service

documents.title: sherlock steps back
text: sherlock fans at comic-con were treated to a teaser for the victorian special , which is yet to receive a transmission date .
the one-off episode is set in the original period it was written by arthur conan doyle .

documents.title: more sunny afternoons to come
text: hit musical sunny days , about the rise to fame of the kinks , is extending its west end run by six months .
the show won four olivier awards this year , including best new musical .
written by kinks frontman ray davies and joe penhall , the show features some of the '60s band 's biggest hits , such as you really got me , waterloo sunset and lola .
it will now run until at least april 2016 , at the harold pinter theatre .

documents.title: unseen pooh image for sale
text: this previously unseen winnie the pooh drawing goes under the hammer at sotheby 's next week , with an estimated price of £ 30-50,000 .

the eh shepard illustration , which was not used in aa milne 's original series of books , shows pooh and piglet standing at the foot of owl 's house , chesnuts - `` an old-world residence of great charm '' .
it was found in a drawer by shepard 's wife , norah , and presented to composer julian slade to mark the opening night of his winnie the pooh musical .

documents.title: ariana grande apologises for apology
text: pop singer ariana grande has apologised again - for not apologising properly the first time round for the `` doughnut fiasco '' .
a video was leaked that showed grande licking doughnuts on a shop counter and saying she hated americans .
her original apology referenced her slur on her on country , but glossed over the doughnut licking , which is now being investigated by police and health officials .
she posted a four-minute video to youtube .
`` seeing a video of yourself behaving poorly is such a rude awakening - it 's like , you do n't know what to do .
i was so disgusted with myself .
i wanted to shove my face into a pillow and disappear .

documents.title: thinking small
text: ahead of the release of the latest superhero movie , ant-man , comes the antsibition - a small-scale exhibition which gives visitors `` a unique chance to experience the tiny world of ant-man '' .
the exhibition takes place at london 's old street station from 14-17 july , and includes a new bespoke piece by british micro-artist willard wigan featuring ant-man in the eye of the needle .

documents.title: rain or shine ?
text: good news and bad news on the weather front for those at t in the park this weekend - the forecast is for some sun , but also lots and lots of rain .
friday looks like a largely dry day up until 21:00 bst , when there is a good chance of heavy rain , according to bbc weather .
saturday afternoon looks like being a soggy one , but sunday so far looks to be fine .
among the acts performing at the festival 's new venue at strathallan castle are kasabian , noel gallagher 's high flying birds and avicii .

documents.title: 'international reputation '
text: the eno 's acting chairman harry brunjes is leading tributes to outgoing artistic director john berry .
john berry 's contribution to eno over the past two decades has been phenomenal .
under his leadership , the artistic programme at eno has been unrivalled in its quality , ability to entertain and to innovate .
he has helped build eno a uk-wide and international reputation for excellent dramatic opera that makes us unique - introducing directors from other art forms to the world of opera .

documents.title: breakingbreaking news
text: the artistic director of the english national opera , john berry , is stepping down after 20 years , following a troubled period for the institution .
`` my work is now done and eno is today regarded as one of the most creative forces in opera , '' he said .
`` the decision feels right to leave at the end of a hugely successful season both from an artistic perspective and in terms of audience numbers . ''
eno was recently effectively placed in special measures by arts council england , and warned its funding would be cut entirely if it did not improve its business model .

documents.title: greg james on new chart countdown
text: our colleagues at newsbeat have spoken to self-confessed `` radio nerd '' greg james , host of the top 40 countdown , which starts in its new slot on friday - and sees all new singles and albums released on the same day globally .
james says he thinks it 's `` a great day for the charts '' .
`` there was a time about four or five years ago when i do n't think as many people cared about the charts .
but now with the popularity of lists - spotify playlists , deezer playlists , apple music playlists - it 's made that important again .
people love a list . ''
and his for worst number one ?
`` it 's obvious to say but it 's the crazy frog ``

documents.title: doctor who trailer
text: `` i want to kiss it to death ``
the trailer for the ninth season of doctor who debuted at comic-con on thursday , offering a fleeting glimpse of game of thrones star maisie williams , a city of daleks and more missy

documents.title: starr loses libel claim
text: comedian freddie starr has lost his claim for damages against a woman who claimed he groped her 41 years ago .
karin ward alleged that mr starr abused her in jimmy savile 's dressing room at the bbc in 1974 , when she was 15 .
starr denied the claims and sued for libel and slander , saying he had lost £ 300,000 from cancelled bookings .

documents.title: contemporary take on la dolce vita
text: la dolce vita is to get a modern makeover .
los angeles-based ambi group has closed an option agreement with the fellini family to make a new feature based on federico fellini 's 1960s classic film .
`` we 've been approached countless times and asked to consider everything from remakes and re-imaginings to prequels and sequels , '' said fellini 's niece , francesca .
`` we knew it would take very special producers and compelling circumstances to motivate the family to allow rights to be optioned . ''
a spokesman for ambi pictures promised `` all of the elements that made la dolce vita an instant classic '' .
`` our vision is of a contemporary story every bit as commercial , iconic and award-worthy as the original . ''
the original film starred marcello mastroianni as a philandering paparazzo journalist in rome .
author: Screen Daily

documents.title: from rags to retches
text: a boyband member who wanted to get around paying excess baggage collapsed from apparent heat exhaustion on an easyjet flight , after opting to wear all of his clothes .

james mcelvar ( centre ) , of scottish band rewind , put on five pairs of trousers , six t-shirts , four jumpers , two jackets and two hats , after a row at check-in about him having two carry-on bags .
he told the newspaper he took the clothes off after boarding the plane , but suffered a fit and was treated by an off-duty paramedic .
`` i thought i was a goner and that i was having a heart attack , '' he said .
author: The Sun

documents.title: cosby star to stay
text: bill cosby 's star on the hollywood walk of fame will not disappear , despite calls for it to be removed .
`` the hollywood walk of fame is a registered historic landmark .
once a star has been added to the walk , it is considered a part of the historic fabric of the hollywood walk of fame .
`` because of this , we have never removed a star from the walk , '' said leron gubler , president of the hollywood chamber of commerce .
black civil rights leaders are leading demands for its removal , following revelations that comedian cosby
a statue of cosby was removed from a disney theme park earlier this week .

documents.title: affleck 'to direct batman '
text: ben affleck is rumoured to be in talks to direct himself in a standalone batman film - even before his own introduction as the caped crusader .
affleck is already slated to direct live by night , his first time back in the director 's chair since argo won best at the oscars in 2013 .
he will make his debut as batman in batman v superman sometime next year .

documents.title: get involved
text: so was harper lee a one-hit wonder - and does the first chapter offer any startling revelations ?
and what are your thoughts on the news - and dodgy outfits - from comic-con ?
send an email to entertainment.news @ bbc.co.uk or , via twitter , on @ twitterid
author: Keily Smith
Entertainment reporter
